Articles.Content: I couldn't find anything on automating, say, moving of joints and ligaments that I made with kOS? I just made this walker rover thing that is stable without SAS, but it is very complicated to use... and I feel a little kOS script could change that. Anyone have some ideas as to how I would do this? I've also began the same ambition as to make a relatively large human model, with muscles and such. It will be unpilotable without kOS.

There have been some tests with pretty much functioning IR/kOS integration that were not made public outside of some demo videos. However, there was an undisclosed problem that needed fixing before release. Now, however, Sirkut has indicated that he wants to do a rewrite of the IR guts completely. No indication of an ETA.

Long story short: its coming, but when is unknown.
definately want some ik scripts so i can have some big stompy mech action. get some kerbattletech on. i want kahn jeb to battle against the inner ksphere.

I need this

Edited June 27, 2014 by clown_baby
